required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Sodium Excretion of LCZ696 in Patients With Hypertension; Heart Failure and Healthy Volunteers
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Double-blind, Controlled, Crossover Study to Evaluate the Sodium Excretion of LCZ696 in Patients With Stable Heart Failure, in Patients With Hypertension, and in Healthy Volunteers

brief_summary.textblock: Assess mechanism of action of LCZ696 related to sodium excretion.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.description: Urine was collected in 12-hour intervals, and of each pooled 24-hour (daily) sample, sodium concentration was measured. The measure type used for this outcome measure (OM) was Geometric Least square Means (LSM).

Urine was collected in 12-hour intervals, and of each pooled 24-hour (daily) sample, sodium concentration was measured. The measure type used for this outcome measure (OM) was Geometric Least square Means (LSM).

secondary_outcome.description: Urine was collected in 12-hour intervals, and of each pooled 24-hour (daily) sample, urine volume was measured. The measure type used for this OM was Geometric LSM.
Urine was collected in 12-hour intervals, and of each pooled 24-hour (daily) sample, urine volume was measured. The measure type used for this OM was Geometric LSM.

secondary_outcome.measure: Urinary Cyclic Guanosine Monophosphate (cGMP) Excretion Over 24 Hours
secondary_outcome.description: cGMP was analyzed at a central laboratory. The measure type used for this OM was Geometric LSM.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percent Change From Baseline in Plasma Mid-regional Pro-atrial Natriuretic Peptide (MR-proANP) Biomarker
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 2, 4, 6 and 12 hours post dose on day 1; 24 hours post dose on day 2; 2, 4, 6 and 12 hours post dose on day 7
secondary_outcome.description: MR-proANP was analyzed at a central laboratory.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percent Change From Baseline in Brain Natriuretic Peptide (BNP) Biomarker
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 0.5, 1, 2, 4, 6 and 12 hours post dose on day 1; 24 hours post dose on day 2; 0, 4, 6 and 12 hours post dose on day 7
secondary_outcome.description: BNP was analyzed at a central laboratory.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percent Change From Baseline in Mid-regional Pro-adrenomedullin (MR-proADM) Biomarker
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 2, 4, 6 and 12 hours post dose on day 1; 24 hours post dose on day 2; 0, 4, 6 and 12 hours post dose on day 7
secondary_outcome.description: MR-proADM was analyzed at a central laboratory.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percent Change From Baseline in C-type Natriuretic Peptide (proCNP) Biomarker
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 2, 4, 6, 8 and 12 hours post dose on day 1; day 2; 0, 4, 6, 8 and 12 hours post dose on day 7
secondary_outcome.description: ProCNP was analyzed at a central laboratory.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percent Change From Baseline in C-terminal-proendothelin-1 (CT-proET-1) Biomarker
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 12 hours post dose on day 1; 24 hours post dose on day 2; 0 and 12 hours post dose on day 7
secondary_outcome.description: CT-proET-1 was analyzed at a central laboratory.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percent Change From Baseline in N-terminal-proBNP (NT-proBNP) Biomarker
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 2, 4, 6 and 12 hours post dose on day 1; 24 hours post dose on day 2; 0, 4, 6 and 12 hours post dose on day 7
secondary_outcome.description: NT-proBNP was analyzed at a central laboratory.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percent Change From Baseline in Aldosterone Biomarker
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 6 and 12 hours post dose on day 1; 24 hours post dose on day 2; 0, 6 and 12 hours post dose on day 7
secondary_outcome.description: Aldosterone was analyzed at a central laboratory.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percent Change From Baseline in Urinary Electrolyte Excretion (Sodium, Potassium, Chloride and Calcium)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 2, 4, 6 and 12 hours post dose on day 1; 24 hours post dose on day 2; 0, 4, 6 and 12 hours post dose on day 7
secondary_outcome.description: Urine was collected in 12-hour intervals, and of each pooled 24-hour (daily) sample, sodium, potassium, albumin and calcium were measured.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percent Change From Baseline in Blood Plasma Creatinine
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 4, 6 and 12 hours post dose on day 1; 24 hours post dose on day 2; 0, 4, 6 and 12 hours post dose on day 7
secondary_outcome.description: Blood plasma creatinine was analyzed at a central laboratory.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 0, 2, 4 and 6 hours post dose on day 1; 0, 2, 4 and 6 hours post dose on day 7
secondary_outcome.description: GFR was used as a measure of renal function.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 0, 2, 4 and 6 hours post dose on day 1; 0, 2, 4 and 6 hours post dose on day 7
secondary_outcome.description: RBF was used as a measure of renal function.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 0, 0.5, 1, 2, 4, 8 and 12 hours post dose on day 1; day 2; 0, 0.5, 1, 2, 4, 8 and 12 hours post dose on day 7
secondary_outcome.description: Systolic blood pressure measurements were taken.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 0, 0.5, 1, 2, 4, 8 and 12 hours post dose on day 1; day 2; 0, 0.5, 1, 2, 4, 8 and 12 hours post dose on day 7
secondary_outcome.description: Diastolic blood pressure measurements were taken.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 0, 0.5, 1, 2, 4, 8 and 12 hours post dose on day 1; day 2; 0, 0.5, 1, 2, 4, 8 and 12 hours post dose on day 7

arm_group.arm_group_label: LCZ696 to Valsartan - Heart Failure (HF) cohort
arm_group.description: Participants in this arm received Valsartan 160 mg twice daily (bid) during open-label run-in, LCZ696 200 mg bid double blind treatment during period 1, Valsartan 160 mg bid during wash-out, and Valsartan 160 mg bid double blind treatment during period 2.

Participants in this arm received Valsartan 160 mg twice daily bid during open-label run-in, Valsartan 160 mg bid during period 1, Valsartan 160 mg bid during wash-out, and LCZ696 200 mg bid double blind treatment during period 2.

Participants in this arm received Valsartan 320 mg once daily (qd) during open-label run-in, LCZ696 400 mg qd double blind treatment during period 1, Valsartan 320 mg qd during wash-out, and Valsartan 320 mg qd double blind treatment during period 2.

Participants in this arm received Valsartan 320 mg qd during open-label run-in, Valsartan 320 mg qd during period 1, Valsartan 320 mg qd during wash-out, and LCZ696 400 qd bid double blind treatment during period 2.

intervention.arm_group_label: LCZ696 to Valsartan - Heart Failure (HF) cohort
LCZ696 to Valsartan - Heart Failure (HF) cohort

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients with heart failure: documented NYHA class II-III heart failure
- Patients with hypertension: stable hypertensive medication for the preceding 2 months
Exclusion Criteria:
- Women of childbearing potential
- History of recent myocardial infarction
- History of dialysis or renal transplant
- Patients with type 1 diabetes mellitus

participant_flow.recruitment_details: In each of the HF and HTN cohorts, 16 participants (total = 32) received LCZ696 or Valsartan in period 1. Then, there was a cross-over where participants received LCZ96 or Valsartan in period 2.

group.title: LCZ696 to Valsartan - Heart Failure (HF) Cohort
group.description: Participants in this arm received Valsartan 160 mg twice daily (bid) during open-label run-in, LCZ696 200 mg bid double blind treatment during period 1, Valsartan 160 mg bid during wash-out, and Valsartan 160 mg bid double blind treatment during period 2.

group.title: Valsartan to LCZ696 - HF Cohort
group.description: Participants in this arm received Valsartan 160 mg twice daily bid during open-label run-in, Valsartan 160 mg bid during period 1, Valsartan 160 mg bid during wash-out, and LCZ696 200 mg bid double blind treatment during period 2.

group.title: LCZ696 to Valsartan - Hypertension (HTN) Cohort
group.description: Participants in this arm received Valsartan 320 mg once daily (qd) during open-label run-in, LCZ696 400 mg qd double blind treatment during period 1, Valsartan 320 mg qd during wash-out, and Valsartan 320 mg qd double blind treatment during period 2.

group.description: Participants in this arm received Valsartan 320 mg qd during open-label run-in, Valsartan 320 mg qd during period 1, Valsartan 320 mg qd during wash-out, and LCZ696 400 qd bid double blind treatment during period 2.

group.title: Total
group.description: Total of all reporting groups

measure.title: Age
measure.description: Age mean and standard deviation (SD) for HF cohort was 65.4 (9.57); age mean and SD for HTN cohort was 58.8 (8.15)

outcome.title: 24-hour Urinary Sodium Excretion
outcome.description: Urine was collected in 12-hour intervals, and of each pooled 24-hour (daily) sample, sodium concentration was measured. The measure type used for this outcome measure (OM) was Geometric Least square Means (LSM).
outcome.population: The Pharmacodynamic (PD) analysis set, which included all participants who had no major protocol deviation with impact on PD data, were included in the analysis.

group.title: LCZ696 - Heart Failure (HF) Cohort
group.description: Participants in this arm received Valsartan 160 mg twice daily (bid) during open-label run-in, LCZ696 200 mg bid double blind treatment during period 1, Valsartan 160 mg bid during wash-out, and Valsartan 160 mg bid double blind treatment during period 2.

outcome.title: Percent Change From Baseline in Mid-regional Pro-adrenomedullin (MR-proADM) Biomarker
outcome.description: MR-proADM was analyzed at a central laboratory.
outcome.time_frame: 2, 4, 6 and 12 hours post dose on day 1; 24 hours post dose on day 2; 0, 4, 6 and 12 hours post dose on day 7
outcome.population: The HF arms only of the Pharmacodynamic (PD) analysis set, which included all participants who had no major protocol deviation with impact on PD data, were included in the analysis. MR-proADM is considered a biomarker for HF only; therefore, the HTN cohort was not assessed.

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: The terms and conditions of Novartis' agreements with its investigators may vary. However, Novartis does not prohibit any investigator from publishing. Any publications from a single-site are postponed until the publication of the pooled data (i.e., data from all sites) in the clinical trial or disclosure of trial results in their entirety.

clinical_results.limitations_and_caveats: Regarding LSM = 1218.56 for LCZ696 HTN cohort arm at Day 1, 1.0 hr post dose, the value was heavily inflated due to one participant with a very high change from baseline.
